text: My child was in the infant care since 4 months old. Teachers there are nice, activities for infant are fun & engaging, teacher also always make effort to create nice backdrop and decor for festival celebration. My child is happy during morning drop off most of the day, that's all matters.

Both our kids were with MPB CBP - one from infant care and the other from nursery.  Both had great experiences and made many friends.  We loved the teachers who were kind and very responsive / receptive to parentsâ€™ feedback.

Very caring and attentive teachers!! Our little one joined Maplebear infantcare at around 10months. The teachers and staff ensured a smooth transition and easy settlement for our daughter from the start attending to all our needs and wishes and always updating us about our daughter's wellbeing at school. We are very happy watching her progress at maplebear and thank all her care givers for making it such a wonderful journey!

We were initially hesitant to send our kid here as it is a relatively new campus and it is not as convenient for us; but it was the only few options available atm. To our surprise, it had been the best decision!
Our kid loves attending school. Teachers and principal are all super attentive and caring! They are also very responsive and are able to put us (parents) at ease - which is what I truly fully appreciate.

My kids are very happy with the school! The teachers have been very nice and patient helping the little one to settle nicely in school. The elder one loves the activities and friends she has make there. Lovely environment!
